mig.core

Class Code

  • java.lang.Object
    • mig.core.Bolt
      • mig.core.Code

  • public class Code
extends Bolt
    Code is the class that creates a lock with a password to unlock it. Code extends from Bolt.

    A Code contains this element

    • A password that is used to unlock the Chest
    Version:
    22/11/2016
    Author:
    Group 8
    See Also:
    Bolt, Chest

      private boolean good_pass 
      private java.lang.String password
      String that contains the password to unlock he Bolt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void givePassword(java.lang.String pass)
      Private Method to test if the password given is the same as the password of the Bolt If the password given by the player is false, it returns an error message that tells the player the password is wrong
      void unlockIt()
      The complete method to try to unlock the Code

    • Constructor Detail

      • Code

        public Code(java.lang.String mdp)
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        mdp - Password to unlock the Bolt The Code is a Bolt locked as default. If the password given is null, the password will be "42"

    • Method Detail

      • givePassword

        public void givePassword(java.lang.String pass)
        Private Method to test if the password given is the same as the password of the Bolt If the password given by the player is false, it returns an error message that tells the player the password is wrong
        Parameters:
        pass - Password given to try to unlock the chest

      • unlockIt

        public void unlockIt()
        The complete method to try to unlock the Code
        Overrides:
        unlockIt in class Bolt
        Parameters:
        mdp - Password given to try to unlock the chest throw an exception
